column4: (I'm using Hardy): Is there an applet like Windows Sidebar in Ubuntu? If not, is there a "sticky note" applet where I can have "sticky" notes on the desktop?

I can't figure out how to have Tomboy notes stay on the screen...what I'm looking for is something that mimics actually sticking a piece of paper to the desktop with a note on it...only it doesnt get in the way of the screen
thanks fryguy and eseven73 for replying
you could always do 'apt-cache search notes' in a terminal
